sections.text: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Illinois Bond Replacement Act.

sections.heading: As used in this Act, unless the context otherwise requires:
sections.text:
the terms
described in Sections 2.01 through 2.05 have the meanings ascribed to them
in those Sections.

sections.heading: "Bond" includes general obligation bonds, revenue bonds and refunding
sections.text:
bonds heretofore or hereafter issued by the State of Illinois, or by any
local governmental entity as well as any coupons issued in connection
therewith.

sections.heading: "Local governmental entity" includes local public entities, as defined
sections.text:
in Section 1-206 of the "Local Governmental and Governmental Employees Tort
Immunity Act", and all other governmental bodies authorized by any Illinois
law to issue bonds.

sections.heading: "Issuing authority" means the corporate authorities or governing body
sections.text:
empowered or directed by Illinois law to issue bonds on behalf of the State
of Illinois or a local governmental entity.
